inn1.comm: on target, around off, back of a length, defended
gets inside the line, works it away from middle and leg
short and wide, looks to cut, then realises it is not short enough, and he pulls out of the shot
looking to tuck him up with one into the ribs, doesn't get high enough, and is worked away square of fine leg
defends a length delivery with an open face, towards point

poor delivery, into the pads, and easily clipped away towards the deep square boundary. Not enough power in it to the reach the boundary, and they are a bit lazy in getting back for the third, saved by a way ward throw
short outside off, Dilshan throws everything at it, and swings at thin air, under the ball
length ball, just outside off, hit powerfully, straight to mid-off
slightly shorter and slower to off stump, played with an open face towards point

lazy running for the third run gets Tharanga finally. Punched away through the covers, doesn't reach the fence, Kohli gives the chase, fumbles, and then lets rip a throw on the top of the stumps to find him short. Tharanga, who has ambled the first two runs, is surprised that the throw came to his end. Almost Indian running
length ball outside off, defended
jags back in, Samaraweera manages to bring the bat in front of his pads
back of a length, defended
looks for the big hit through the cover, gets the inside half of the bat
short, not much room, but he manages to punch it powerfully, but straight to point
back of a length, no room, Dilshan goes back and defends
push-drive, open face, towards extra cover, Raina makes a diving save
into the pads, can't get it past midwicket
length ball, driven back down the ground, Dinda fields in his follow through
lovely delivery, 143.3ks, just back of a length, just outside off, holding its line, beating him
pushed away through the covers, and this time they say no the risky second
back of a length, outside off, punched away to point
punched away nicely, but on the bounce to short cover point
sharp movement into the batsman, beats him, hits him high on the front pad, and might even be going down
back of a length, off-stump line, defended off the back foot
looks to drop and run, but it has travelled too fast towards short cover
length ball, driven on the up, but too close to Yadav, who fields in his follow through
extra bounce, 140.4ks, Samaraweera looks to cut but is surprised by the bounce, and is beaten
short ball, pulled away, one bounce to deep square leg. The fine leg was up, the square leg back, so there seems to be a plan to bowl short at him
another powerful shot from Dilshan finds a fielder, mid-off this time
leans into the shot, merely pushes at a length ball, and finds the gap between point and cover for two runs
comes forward and defends a length ball outside off
this one stays low. Samaraweera goes front and across to pull it from outside off, and it passes under his bat, and bounces in front of Karthik
guided away to third man where Ojha fumbles to let them come back for two
looks to drive on the up, and gets a thick outside edge towards third man for a single
short, wide, cut away, gets a single to third man
extra bounce from back of a length, and he withdraws at the last moment
leaves this alone, just outside off
goes back into the crease and defends a shortish delivery
looks to cut this one, but it is too close to him, and gets a bottom edge towards point
steered away from outside off, towards third man
fullish delivery but he stays back to defend towards cover
Dilshan times a drive well once again, and once again finds a fielder - mid-off this time
frustration shows as he looks to pull one from outside off that is not quite short, and gets a top edge that manages to clear mid-on, only just
punched away, one bounce to short cover
slower ball outside off, and he doesn't have anything to do with it
length ball, in his zone, push-driven, straight to mid-off again
back of a length, around off, punched away, again to a fielder.
Finally, there is a boundary. Charges at him, gets under a short delivery, and slices it deliberately over the covers. Almost goes for a six, hitting the rope on a half-volley
worked away off the hips, finds the square leg fielder
shot! Short ball again, and Samaraweera makes room and upper-cuts, and again it falls about a foot short of the rope at the point boundary
now the touch shot, punched away off the back foot, standing tall on his toes, hitting it past mid-off for one
and Dilshan still not to 100%, looks to pull, mis-hits, and clears midwicket
yorker, dug out, towards point
steered away to third man for one
slower ball, Dilshan sees it coming, presses forward and defends
into the pads, misses out, especially with the fine leg up in the circle, gets hit in the thigh pad

and finally, Dilshan gets both timing and placement right in the same shot. Dinda is bowling too many slower balls and is not disguising them well at all. And it is short and wide, and Dilshan crashes it through the off side
short, into the body, pulled away to deep square leg for one
short, into the body, waits for it and then whips it away nicely towards deep midwicket. Deep square leg has to get around to save four, and strangely they take just two
short ball, punched away to cover
short and wide, cut away to deep point for one
nicely tossed up, presses right forward and defends

Ojha strikes in his first over! Not the smartest of shots, giving him the charge too early, and Ojha shortens the length, and Samaraweera is nowhere close to the pitch of the ball and pushes at it away from the body. There is enough turn to beat that push, and Karthik does the rest
turn there, and Mathews presses forward and defends
slower in the air, higher in the flight, and there is turn for him to beat a defensive prod from Mathews
nicely played, driven inside out, past a diving extra cover, gets a single
bowled from wide of the crease, angled into the pads, and then gets turn towards middle stump. Defended
flighted outside off, defended
pushed towards cover
flighted around off, pushed to cover again
flat and fired down the leg side for a wide
leans forward to defend this outside off
turn and bounce, from just outside off, and Dilshan ends up jabbing at it, the edge flies wide of slip
punched away to sweeper-cover for one
well forward to defend this one
flighted around off, played securely back to the bowler
slightly shorter, played with a dead bat again
massive turn and low bounce, from leg to wide of off, beats him
flighted around off, pushed to long-off for a single
shimmies down and hits it to long-off for one
pitched middle and leg, turns away a bit, hit back to the bowler
short ball, cut away to sweeper-cover for one
nice flight and turn, outside off, Mathews does well to keep it along the ground
pushes forward and defends towards cover
comes forward and defends this one
quick feet, cuts a fullish delivery away for one to sweeper-cover
pushed away to sweeper-cover
charges at him, gets to the pitch of it, and pushes it past extra cover
leg-stump line, defended
again middle-and-leg line, played securely back to the bowler
looks for the big drive, ends up pushing to cover
hit down to long-off for one
gets an inside edge on the legbreak that doesn't turn much
pushed to mid-on
defended back to the bowler
cut away, can't get it past cover
top shot! out of the blue! Charges down and makes room at the same time, and clears his arms to send it into the first tier behind long-on
swept away, square of deep fine leg, comes back for two
flighted delivery, pushed to long-off for one
into the pads, worked around the corner
flighted delivery again, dead-bats it back to the bowler
arm ball, opens the face and guides it to sweeper-cover
defends a length ball back to the bowler
Mathews into the act now, short, long hop, rocks back, clears the front leg, and deposits it behind deep midwicket
fuller delivery, defended to cover
drops towards cover and runs
beaten on the cut shot, and it is too full for the shot
pushed through, looks to guide it with the pace, can't get it past short third
shortish, leg and middle, helped away for a single
sharp turn, from middle and leg to outside off, beats a defensive poke
comes right forward, then goes back to cut, gets a bottom edge towards slip, on the bounce
more turn, seems like Dilshan is beaten, but towards then end he withdrew from the shot, holding the bat well inside the line
flighted around off, and pushed to long-off for one
starts flat and wide, and is cut away, only because backward point gets a hand to it, the boundary is saved
short and wide again, cut in front of square this time, gets a single
short and wide, punched away to sweeper-cover for one
again short and wide, and cut away in front of square again, seemed he wanted to delay the shot and get it behind square, but it didn't quite come on
fuller this time, guided to point
this is much better, flighted around off and middle, and defended back to the bowler
short and wide, beaten on the cut
nicely tossed up, Dilshan defends off the front foot
arm ball, Dilshan ends up pushing in front of the body, gets an inside edge, which is safe
sharp turn again, beats him outside off
short and wide, and asking to be punished, and Dilshan obliges by cutting it fine of deep point for four
oh what shot, slight shimmy, and walloped back at him. Unfortunately it hits the stumps, and it hits them so hard the bail flies almost all the way to the strikers' end
tip and run, they are both quick
once again, India have batted Dilshan back to form! Poor delivery, flat outside off, he cuts, gets an edge, and it goes fine for four. Fifty for Dilshan
another long hop, Dilshan is very quick with his feet and rocks back and pulls it over midwicket
flighted around off, hit to short cover
back of a length, around off, looks to force it square, but can't find the gap between point and cover-point
similar delivery, nicely pushed away to sweeper-cover
flighted around off, defended back to the bowler
looks to tip and run but has hit it straight to cover
back of a length, guided to sweeper-cover
into the pads, worked around the corner
chips down the track, but hits straight to straight extra cover
shorter delivery, Dilshan goes back and gets a single to long-off
another long hop, the turn saves it from being smoked over midwicket
flighted delivery, pushed to sweeper-cover
into the pads, helped away for one
worked around the corner for one
length ball, played back to the bowler
gets an outside edge as he looks to defend this one, it is safe as he has played with soft hands

and Dilshan has run himself out after looking to have regained some form. Low full toss, worked to square leg, Dilshan calls Mathews for one, and then stops after taking a couple of strides, and that hesitation causes him his wicket as Rohit's throw is accurate and Mishra makes no mistake
low full toss on the pads, helped away for two
chips down the track and pushes it down to long-on for one
defends the first ball he faces
turn outside off, and beats a defensive poke from Kapuegedera

Kapugedera has done everything to get himself out lbw here! Goes back to a fullish delivery and misses it and is hit smack in front of stumps. But Mishra seems to have got too much turn and Umpire Tiffin reckons it could not have pitched inside the line if it was hitting the stumps. And half of it did pitch outside the line of leg stump
back of a length, pushed to cover
short, into the hips, hit to midwicket
slightly fuller, into middle and leg, hit to midwicket
full, angling in, worked away for one
misses out on gift down the leg side, and gets only two leg-byes
short ball, into the throat area, keeps it down
flighted around middle and leg, worked to midwicket
into the pads, finds short fine leg
full on the pads, whipped away to midwicket, gets one
presses forward and defends
once again an immaculate front-foot defensive
pushed down the ground, but back to the bowler
charges down the track, and forces it to sweeper-cover
short and wide, looks to cut it, and is beaten
slower ball, steered down to third man
driven on the up, wide of sweeper-cover, comes back for two
short ball, pulled away to deep square leg
short again, pulled fine this time, gets another single
takes a step down the pitch and hits it back to the bowler
flighted delivery, defended towards cover
comes down the pitch and pushes it down to long-on
pushed down to long-on for another single
googly, short, turning down the leg side, and even though he is beaten it is down the leg side
nice shot, chips down the track and chips it over extra cover
just outside off stump line, pushed out to the off side
slower, fuller, on the middle and off, driven down to long-off
turns from the middle stump, Angelo stretches forward to defend
goes back to work it from outside off to backward square-leg. Wristy.
slower, just outside off, pushed through point
on the off stump line, spinning away, defended on the front foot
Long hop and it has been smashed. He moves outside leg stump, opened up his stance and whacked it to midwicket boundary.
flatter, fuller around off stump, defended on the front foot
gets back to work it behind square-leg
leans forward to defend the flighted leg break to the off side
on the leg stump line, flicked behind square-leg .. Neatly done ..
And again. Nicely turned away towards fine-leg region
on the middle stump line, pushed back to the bowler
gets forward to tap the ball towards the non striker
arm ball on the middle stump line, punched back down the track
thinks about jumping out before he decides to just lunge out and push it to point
on the leg and middle, worked to midwicket
shorter in length, flatter, clipped past square-leg
low dipping full toss on the leg stump line, flicked away to deep midwicket

Karthik misses a run-out chance  it was turned past square-leg and they decided to go for the second run ... Jadeja ripped the throw .. Karthik messes up. He broke the stumps with his gloves just before the throw came in! Kapu was well short of the crease and would have been run out ..
wristed away for a run
turned to square-leg for a single
takes couple of steps down the track and on drives to long-on
leans forward to tap it to the on side
goes down the track and works it to midwicket
full and on the legs, tickled to short fine-leg
leans forward to tap it back down the track
gets forward to push it away
around the off stump line, defended to covers
comes in with the arm, on the middle stump line, pushed to the on side of the pitch
length ball, around off, hit back to the bowler who does well to field to his left
angled into the pads, worked away to fine leg for one
angled into the pads again, stops on him a touch, making him hit in the air, but tit falls short of midwicket
too short, too high, called wide
looks to guide this with an open face but finds backward point
hitting good areas again, back of a length, just outside off, gets bounce too
length ball, played with soft hands, comes through for one
fired into the pads, worked away for one
looks to work this around his front pad, is beaten but it is headed down the leg side
shimmies down the track and works it away to long-on
worked around the corner for a single
inside-out drive, all along the ground, wide of sweeper-cover, comes back for two
looks for a single, but has hit too hard and straight to cover
full in length and moving down leg, Angelo tries to flick, misses and is hit on the pad. Opportunity missed there
just outside off stump this time and Angelo defends on the front foot
banged in short and Anglelo has lots of time to play the pull shot to fine-leg .. he almost waited for the ball to arrive before he swatted it away
back of length around off and middle, steered to backward point
gets forward to push the length delivery to cover point
short in length around middle and off line, he stays back to clip it behind square-leg
into the pads, worked around the corner
turn again, and makes him defend after having charged down the track
flighted delivery around off, defended to cover
comes down the track again, pushes it down to long-on
sent back by Kapugedera as he thinks it it hit straight to point, but Rohit misfields and they come through for one

Kapugedera will still hope he had not taken the single. Back on strike, he charges down the track, is not quite to the pitch of the ball, and ends up chipping it in front of his body, straight down the lap of long-off
back of a length, into the pads, hit to midwicket
pushes this to mid-on for one
goes for the pull first ball, gloves it fine and over the keeper for four
hit on the up, one bounce to cover
fuller ball, pushed to long-on for one
yorker, just outside off, dug out
flighted around off, pushed back to the bowler
Silva is gone! premeditates the sweep, gets way too far across the stumps, misses a full and straight delivery, and is a dead duck
defended to cover
full ball, hit back to the bowler
no turn and he defends outside off and is beaten
turning into the pads, beaten and hit in the pad
short ball, bounces low, and hence he has to abort the pull and hit down to long-on
googly, guided past short third for a single
short again, hit straight to midwicket
worked away wide of midwicket for one
another googly, but too short, pulled down to long-on
low full toss on the pads, worked away for a single
fifty for Mathews, with a single to cover
massive slog, in his zone, and he deposits it over midwicket
back of a length, pushed to long-on for one
squared up a bit as he looks to work it to leg
nurdled away for one
hit hard at the bowler, and a fumble gets them a single
full toss outside off, crashed past extra cover, easy pickings
low full toss on the pads, worked away, wide of deep square, gets a couple
full and wide, and hit between cover and extra cover, heavy outfield and Raina's spirited chase keep them to three
full and straight, and he gets a single to midwicket
back of a length, pushed to point, no run
short ball, steered to third man for a single
starts off with a length ball, Perera hits it powerfully, but Dinda gets a hand to it in the follow through
yorker just outside off, beaten, and then it moves extravagantly down the leg side, and Karthik dives full length to save four byes
one of the most obvious slower balls in the business arrives, Mathews waits and waits, and then chips it over extra cover
back of a length, makes room and pulls it down to long-on
overpitched outside off, hit well but finds Jadeja at extra cover, and Jadeja's needless throw gives away an overthrow
overpitched again, on the pads, and worked away past short fine leg for two
short ball, not much pace in it, Mathews clears the front leg and pulls it between mid-on and midwicket. Poor bowling
length ball, hit powerfully, finds extra cover, gets a single
looks for the big slog, gets a bottom edge towards square leg
slower ball, follows him too, a single ensues as the fielders are all at the edge of the ring
clears the front leg easrly, Yadav looks to slant it across his body, but even though he is out of position, Perera manages to hit it over mid-off
hurries him a bit into the pull, gets a top edge but the long-on is back and it bounces in front of him
fumble by Vijay at long-on allows them go back for two
stays back to a fullish delivery, it turns into him too, and cramps up the cut shot
again stays back to a fullish delivery and pulls and finds midwicket. Big wicket for India, Sri Lanka have once again been hit when they looked like getting away
worked around with soft hands, and has enough time to come back for two
flat ball, stays back and defends
gets a bit of a bottom edge as he looks to chop this to third man, gets a single
angling down the leg side, gets Mathews on strike
Angelo! sweeps from middle and leg, sweet connection, and he gets six over deep square leg
follows the batsman and fires this one into his pads, but he gets a single
guided to short third for a single, Mishra's fumble makes the task easier
Mathews backs away too early and Jadeja follows him again, stifling the shot, conceding just a single
sharp turn, beats everything and they steal a bye
flighted delivery, slow through the air, worked away to deep square
lovely placement, he has top-edged the slog sweep bang between four men: the keeper, the bowler, the deep midwicket, the deep backward square
Kulasekara hands over the strike to Mathews again, with a single to midwicket
lovely shot, makes room, chips over extra cover, comes back for three runs
Kulasekara looks for the same big shot, gets an edge to short third
Mathews works this around the corner to retain strike for the next over
Mathews moves across and looks for the scoop and misses a length delivery. pretty cross with himself
and he misses another length ball! Eyes lighten up seeing this length ball, looks for the big mow over midwicket, and misses and loses his off stump
starts off by pushing a length ball into the covers
poor bouncer, 139ks, no sting in it, and Kulasekara makes room and pulls him over midwicket for six
edged away for four all right, but length ball again, and outside off, and Kulasekara goes for the shot over the covers and instead edges it to third man for four
length ball again, pushed down to long-off for one
starts off with one, right into the block hole, concedes just a single
near yorker again, Randiv misses and the ball goes nowhere off the pad. Kulasekara calls him through for a leg-bye, but Dinda gets an easy run-out at non-striker's end
slower ball, but too far outside off
another slower ball, 101ks, too good for Kulasekara who plays across the line and has his middle stump taken out
makes room and smashes a length ball inside-out, towards sweeper-cover for two

another slower ball and another stump is out of the ground! 101.6ks, and Mendis is early into the shot and the leg stump is gone. While the specialist batsmen kept picking his slower balls easily, the same delivery has proved to be too good for the tail

inn2.comm: back of a length, just outside off, hit back to the bowler
shot! walks down the pitch, punches a back-of-a-length delivery square of the wicket, between point and cover-point
stays back to push a shortish delivery back to the bowler
fuller, no signs of swing, Karthik steps down the track and defends
inward movement  now, beats Karthik, but hits him high on the pad, negating the lbw appeal
defends a length ball off the front foot
starts off with a full times, driven to mid-off
back of a length, steered down to third man
length ball, Karthik presses forward and defends
into the pads, worked away to fine leg for one
kicks off a length, 142.1ks, Vijay is stunned, but it is not very well targetted and he can get out of the way easily
into the pads, worked around the corner
good shot, gooood shot, goes back and across and punches this back-of-a-length delivery through point
worked square on the leg side, nice clip off the pads
movement in towards him, beats him attempt at flicking it, concedes a leg-bye
back of a length, around off, pushed back to the bowler
inswigner, appeals for lbw but the batsman is hit outside the line
shimmies down the track and pushes a shortish delivery to mid-off
pinches a single to mid-on
slightly squared up as he defends outside off
back of a length, rising high, Karthik gets on the top of the bounce and defends
gets a thick edge as he goes back in the crease and defends, gets a single to third man
looks to get it high into the rib cage, doesn't rise that high, defended
back of a length, outside off, Vijay keeps his bat inside the line
inswing again, gets a leg-bye
early into the shot, hits uppishly towards mid-on, bounces well in front
punched on the up, straight to cover but
fuller ball, into the pads, flicked away to deep square leg
charges down the track again, and is way early into the attempted flick, lucky not to get a leading edge
bouncer, and it's way too high
gets a thick edge on the cut, for a single to third man
split finger slower ball, doesn't commit to any shot, and then drops it to point and runs
back of a length, high, pushed to point
beautifull slower ball, split-finger again, no clue Vijay has, but the mis-hit lands just in front of square leg
full, into the pads, clipped away past midwicket, nicely played
length ball, around off, defended to cover
lovely shot, plants the front foot down, gets to the pitch of the length ball, and drives it between cover and extra cover
punched away, can't beat cover
fuller, slight shape in, and he plays it respectfully
same area again, not driveable, not short, and Vijay defends again

gone! Kula strikes with the inswinger! Perfect area, and he finally plays the drive, and is beaten and hit on the back leg. It seemed in live time that an inside edge might have saved him, but replays prove the umpire to be correct. Good persistent bowling. On second look, the snicko confirms an edge
and smartly Kula bowls a straighter one outside off, Kohli is up to it and defends
comes forward to defend a fullish delivery
back of a length, gets on his toes and whipped to wide of mid-on for one
on the front foot to a rising delivery, does well to keep it down but Fernando seems to be sensing this early front-foot movement
full ball, driven wide of mid-off for one
worked away off the hip for one
full ball, on the pads, easy pickings, and flicked away nicely
short ball, too short and high
gets the inside half of the bat towards mid-on, and a horrible overthrow from Perera gives them five
punched away square, wide of deep point, for two
comes forward to defend a length ball outside off
back of a length, outside off, defended
inswing again, and this team the bounce saves Kohli
another inswing, this time an inside edge saves Kohli
inswing again, hits him in the thigh pad
carrom ball to begin with, not much deviation, he stays back and pushes him to long-on
another carrom ball, this one draws a false defensive shot outside off
slightly short, and Karthik is quick to rock and cut him between the two points

two-fingered googly, he read it too, rocked back to pull it, and instead of going over midwicket, he hit it straight into his lap. Soft dismissal, he is beside himself, did almost everything right, yet at the last moment the execution went wrong
googly, Rohit goes back to defend
carrom ball, short, pushed to cover
length ball, just outside off, defended
again, in the same area, and he stays on the back foot and defends
inswing again, and Kohli gets another inside edge, for a single to square leg
same area, slight shape in towards the batsman, Sharma pushes it back to the bowler
bouncer this time, and for a change it is not too high
loose shot, away from the body, driving on the up at an inswinger, and ends up swinging outside the line of the ball, and it somehow misses both the inside edge and the off stump
pushes in front of his body, back to the bowler
wristily worked away wide of mid-on for one
googly outside off, looped up high, defended
worked away to midwicket for one
too full, easily pushed to long-on
what an effort for this big fast bowler! He has played a nothing shot in the air towards long-off, and Fernando runs from long-on, and dives full length and can't quite make it
back of a length, swinging in, pushed to cover
pushed to cover again
slightly straighter, and patted back to the bowler
back of a length, doesn't come in, hit to cover
moves across to work this from off-stump line into the leg side for one
slight movement in again, and Sharma defends this towards cover
slower ball, too full, the outside edge goes along the ground to third man
full ball, off and middle, works it into the on side but finds midwicket
nicely worked away off the pads, gets two after hitting wide of deep square
back of a length, played with an open face
steered way to third man for one
another lovely slower ball, just short of a length, gets an outside edge towards third man for one
and drags this one slightly short, and Kohli is quick to rock back and makes sure he goes over the infield
fuller this time, turns away from middle and off, pushed back
too short again, and wide too, and cut away, and they are lazy during the third run, but the high throw saves them
goes deep into the crease to long-on for one
full, into the pads, pushed down to long-on
another single to long-on
turn straight away, played to midwicket with the spin
sharp turn this time, hurries him into a shot towards short fine
stays low outside off, defended
looking to cut the offspinner, patting the burning dog, almost chopped it on
this time manges to guide a fullish delivery past cover for one
nicely worked from outside off towards square leg for one
slowish delivery outside off, watchfully played
short and wide, doesn't quite come on and he hits it straight to point
back of a length, around off, looks to drop and run, but has hit it straight to short cover
again wants a quick single but has hit too powerfully to point
huge shout for caught-behind as he is beaten on the cut shot. Kohli is going nowhere, and Umpire Jerling rightly calls him not-out
into the pads, worked away for a single
angled across, pushed to midwicket
pulled away between deep square leg and deep midwicket for two runs
moves across, gets inside the line, helps it to square leg for one
flighted outside off, and Rohit defends
lovely shot, always beautiful to watch, right to the pitch of it, and then chips it over extra cover
follows it up with a single worked around the corner
needless, rash shot, after two beautiful ones in the last over. Charges at him and seemingly with eyes closed swings at a short ball outside off, and is beaten
legcutter, extra bounce, loose shot away from the body, and lucky not to have edged it
this time steered away along the ground, towards third man
beautiful legcutter, back of a length, just outside off, he has to play at it, and is beaten
too wide this time, cut away easily to deep point
nicely played, slower ball, leans into it and guides it past extra cover, inside-out
topspinner, Kohli stays back and defends
flighted on the pads, worked away to square leg
stays back and pushes it against the turn towards point
chip shot over the on side, lucky not to have timed it well enough to reach deep midwicket
stays low a touch, but Sharma pats it back to the bowler
played with the turn, around the corner for a single
too short, too wide, punched way wide of sweeper-cover, and Tharanga runs a long long distance before putting the dive in, but the Indian batsmen take only two
looks to whip this from outside off into the leg side, ends up hitting it back to the bowler
slower ball, played straight to extra cover
again looks to work it into the leg side and Perera is bowling legcutters here! And again gets a leading edge back to the bowler
ugly ugly hoick, thick outside edge falls short of third man
straying into the pads, worked away to deep square for one
tospinner, lovely bowling, gets a thick edge as he looks to play on the on
and the same fielder is hit in the shin as Kohli flicks
pushed down to long-on for another single
sharp turn, and worked fine of fine leg
driven against the turn, down to long-off for one
slower ball, punched square, straight to point
slower ball again, steered to third man
gets a bit big on him as he looks to punch and the thick edge goes to third man for a single
another innocuous-looking delivery gets big on him, but he manages to run it down to third man
punched through the covers for another single
nicely steered away to third man for a single
superb shot! Gets the front foot down and easily chips it over extra cover, against the turn
cramps him up with turn into the pads
goes back to work this into the on side for a single
worked past midwicket, and they come back for two
again played past midwicket, this time long-on comes around fast to keep them down to one
and worked away again, they are milking them singles now
on the up, nicely eased past extra cover, inside-out, lovely shot for two
slower ball, and this time he ends up playing it in front of his body, and finds extra cover
another good-looking shot, slight movement across, gets inside the line, and flicks/whips it past mid-on. Elegant
looks to cut, hits one bounce to point
on the walk, he hits it to extra cover for a single
pushed to long-on for a single
back of a length, stays back and pushes this carrom ball down to long-on
turn there, not much, and it gets the outside half of the bat towards short cover
into the pads this time, and helped away for one
looks for a single into the on side, but finds midwicket
full delivery and driven down to long-off
back of a length, pushed away for an easy single
helped to sweeper-cover for a single
legcutter, hit strongly but straight to extra cover
drives away from the body, gets a thick edge towards third man
pushed to long-on for another single
slightly slower and shorter, and punched away to sweeper-cover
full and wide, and he mis-hits towards point
hit to sweeper-cover for one
nicely worked away into the on side for another single, this one brings up his fifty
seems to read this googly off the pitch and still has enough time to work it away for a single
full ball, just meets it with the full face and takes a single to long-off
quicker delivery, played to short cover
short outside off, and squeezed through for one
and Kohli gets to 50 too! tip and run again, towards short cover, soft hands do it
full ball, flicked away to fine leg for one
cut away, just wide of third man, and they run hard and fast and come back for two
back of a length, straightening outside off, and defended
driven inside-out, but straight to extra cover
slower ball, patted back to the bowler
nicely driven inside-out, wide of long-off
another single to long-off
flat, back of a length, hit down to long-off
short ball, cut away wide of third man for two
driven wide of long-off and Rohit initiates the second and dives in the crease
slower ball, Rohit defends it into the leg side
lazy bouncer, not much pace or carry behind it, and Sharma rocks back and pulls is majestically over midwicket
full ball, driven to long-off for a single
pull shot again, and the ball stays low and squeezes under it
come forward, checks his shot, gets an inside edge for one
punched away off the back foot, gets a single
flighted outside off, Sharma defends off the front foot
back of a length, and he rocks back and punches it past extra cover for four
premeditated paddle sweep, is hit in the pad
googly, and easily pushed down to long-on
looks for the big shot over the on side, gets the inside half of the bat for a single
another hit past extra cover, gets a single this time
back of a length, hit back to the bowler
inside-out drive again, and Randiv gets a hand as he dives but that's all he can manage
picks the slower one early and gently pushes it to cover-point
driven on the up, to long-on for one
and this time Kohli goes inside-out, they are putting up an exhibition now, easily clears the infield
another slower ball, runs it down to third man
sharp turn, stays back and defends
helped away to short fine, and pinches a single
again they steal a single to short fine leg
short ball, and he is quick to pounce on it and pull it over midwicket
another single to short fine
flighted delivery, helped away to square leg for a single
hit down to long-off for one
pulled away, down to long-on for a single
steered to third man for a single
full toss, hit down to long-on for a single
low full toss, nicely flicked away, straight to midwicket, though
full, on the pads, and easily clipped away
Rohit is in a hurry now, dances down the track, gets to the pitch of the ball, and effortlessly lofts him over wide long-on
looks for single to square leg, and is sent back
dances down the track, doesn't get to the pitch of it this time, and defends
worked around the corner for a single
topspinner, stays a touch low too, and he stays back and defends
floater outside off, turned away into the leg side
full ball, driven to long-on for a single
steered away fine of third man, they come back for two
slower legcutter, whipped away from outside off, between the two deep fielders on the on side
into the pads, helped away for one
slowish short ball, and he swats it out of his face
driven with an open face, to sweeper-cover
short ball, pulled along the ground, finds midwicket
looks for a single into the on side, finds square leg
short, turning in, cut away, square of sweeper-cover, gets two, but the umpire calls one short

Kohli has missed out on a century here! He wants to finish this early, comes down the track to play the lofted shot, but gets too close to the pitch of the ball, and doesn't get the desired elevation and holes out to long-on
Raina steps out and pushes this to long-off for one
flighted delivery, pushed down to long-on
short ball, worked away into the on side for a single
googly, pitches outside leg, Raina tries the sweep, seems he has missed it, but he shows the bat to the umpire as he runs and the as the ball runs down to the fine leg boundary
another googly, played with an open face towards short third
pushed to long-off for an easy single
sees Sharma charge at him, bowls a flat one, and Sharma pads it away
into the pads again, defended
pushed away to sweeper-cover for one
short ball, another single, to long-on this time
into the pads, worked to short fine, Sharma is sent back
dances down the track and slogs, gets a single off the inside half of the bat
straighter one, defended back to the bowler
short, angling across him, and hit on the up, through the gap in the covers, easy pickings
short, into the body, pushed to long-on for one
short, pulled away along the ground, there is a deep square leg to keep them to one
flighted delivery on the pads, defended
short, flat, on the pads, pulled away to deep square for two
googly, stays back to pat it to midwicket

poor bowling, low full toss on the pads with fine leg up, and he works it past the fielder, and the outfield is heavy enough to prevent the boundary. Kulasekara hits the stumps direct, but Raina has just made it for the third run, by a split-frame
low full toss outside off stump, played with an open face towards deep point
yorks him, Sharma hits Raina with a gentle straight hit, and they take a single
short ball, Raina is slow into the pull, the ball passes over the stumps
ducks under this bouncer, and it's way down the leg side too
punched away off the back foot, gets a single to deep point
lovely lovely shot! Length ball, stands tall, and drives it between mid-off and extra cover. One shot away from hundred now
full ball, played away to midwicket
another googly, hit down to long-off for one
googly again, makes room and takes a single to extra cover
flat  ball, stays back and defends
comes down the track and plays inside-out for a single

that's it, back-to-back hundreds! Relief on Sharma's face! And then a big laugh, looks up the skies, acknowledges the standing ovation from the team balcony, hugs Raina, and then removes his helmet and raises his arms. And top shot to get there too, making room and cutting him off the stumps for four
back of a length, punched away between mid-off and extra cover for four
looks to run this down to third man and is beaten
game over as they pinch a single to square leg
